hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of branch Which should be build. If branch does not exist in specific repo master will be used instead.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: enable_junit_tests
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true, runs maven build with unit tests

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: force_clean_workspace
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Clean the workspace and clone the repos

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: revert_test_environment
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true, reverts all VM's snapshots to zero configuration

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: all
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Perform additional build actions or steps to include extra artifacts such as internal and external plugins.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: default_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Default value for building code for version 0.6 / master

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: fork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Github username which has forked main project
